title: Heimerdinger walk animation
body:
Heimerdinger​ can no longer toggle between his normal walk and his swag walk. It was enjoyable and got the name swag walk because no one else was able to do that. And it just looked cool. That and I personally think the old animation was just better in general it flows much better when he walks especially with alien invader and snowmerdinger. 

Also the switching between the two when next to towers is also very confusing and doesn't​ look well either. 

I just feel he should have the choice.

If anyone else agrees reply and say how you feel.

#SaveTheDong

replies.body: Hey guys! This was unintended, we'll be looking into getting a fix in, but it'd likely be with 7.11 and not before. Thanks for raising this! When balancing champions we just try to focus on power, not on ability for champions to strut their stuff down lane.
I now want a John Travolta-esque walk for Jayce
#**_D A D D Y_**
Live Balance is well and good, but you clearly need a Swag Team that focuses on maximizing the enjoyment out of stuff like in-game quests, champion mastery and emote spams.
~~Garen's pushup count should show on the buff bar~~
WAIT! Uncross that out, I wanna see that in game!
Only if you also get a counter for Darius and how long he balances his axe, so that Garen vs Darius matchup is balanced

The funny thing is, Garen is the one champ they would never do that for. They see him as a first-bot-game-ever champ, and wouldn't want new players getting confused and thinking the stacks actually did anything.
I see your name
In my experience his swag walk gives him more power in lane as it asserts his dominance to his lane opponents.
I love this response for some reason.
Elise's Spiderlings still don't dance with her. Can we look into this too?
Then I question your priorities

Power and balancing are important in the game. But sometimes things just need to be goofing or confusing. Makes games interesting and more enjoyable. 

And to be honest I would love more stuff like that. Just stupid little things that add just something small to the game. But are cool because they are there.

While you're at it, Heimer used to be able to spam the ctr2 for the DO-DO-DO-DO-DO-DO-DONT WORRY, at that in itself was a reliable way to bait people in his turrets. This is was a major nerf in his kit that needs to be adressed, plz give him back his taunt spam

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Asyrite,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=J8vFwqHb,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-05-18T18:09:25.655+0000)
>
> Hey guys! This was unintended, we'll be looking into getting a fix in, but it'd likely be with 7.11 and not before. **Thanks for raising this!** When balancing champions we just try to focus on power, not on ability for champions to strut their stuff down lane.

Raise your dongers.

Heimer still changes walk cycles with Taunt, Just not with his other Emotes. Tbh I like this change a lot. Makes sense for him to bring out the swagger when taunting, and makes less hassle for me when laughing at opponents.

Thanks for replying to such posts!
It's good to have conformation of you guys knowing certain issues.

Can you take a look at [my post here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/ZLlb7yUi-about-renektons-bugfix) though, Renekton's W "fix" has been fixed the wrong way around, I reckon the internal comments were the outdated ones.
Even if you guys do want to keep it like this, conformation is always appreciated.

#First they removed spamming his taunt, and now** this?**

This is an outrage, riot need to get their priorities straight.

I miss the Lissandra spam. Probably one of the most beautiful things to spam it and listen to the lovely screaming by my teammates and friends to shut up.

#BringBackSpams2017

Agreed, I went into Practice to test the new changes and it felt odd him going to the other walking animation when near towers and not just increasing speed. Was that done so opponents know or something? Then I just tried to toggle it and it didn't work. Was disappointed. If they want clarity why not just add the speed line this has to him or something similar. {{item:2053}}

Yeah, I get used to champs walks animations. So when it suddenly switches at towers it throws me off. 

And I find it funny that heimer gets the speed up next to opposing teams towers when it's alive but not when dead but that's the opposite of what he needs
As long as I can keep his adorable hopping, I'm good.
The hopping is adorable. But it doesn't look correct with snowmerdinger or alien invader since the hair on those two don't sway with it. And the old walk was with the old model like those skins.
Sounds to me like his other skins need a VU. Not just to the models, either, most of his splashes are really old.

yes he can, why would they remove that?
type /taunt
ez
He can toggle his walk animations????
I think it is the cntrl 2

761 votes and not even 50 upvotes.

Jesus..
~~Let heimerdinger spam his Joke and Taunt again~~
He can toggle his walk animation. Just not by laughing anymore.

he should have his sprint animation when his passive proc's
the one were a rocket appears out of his brain *cough* i mean hair
i did notice one thing that when i got it to toggle for the one game that it did work when ever i leave a tower it switches back to the hop one. which then i had to try to re toggle it.
I managed it to toggle it yesterday, it only worked with the taunt I think.
If I select no, instead of the walk animation being toggled can it just be the swag walk?
Swag walk whaaaat?
